name: Root of all evil (Bradley Jones, willow3w, Ruben Gardiner, Yiling Sun, Zhang haha)
name_original: Root of all evil (Bradley Jones, willow3w, Ruben Gardiner, Yiling Sun, Zhang haha)
description: EVIL ROOTS ARE QUIETLY BREEDING IN THIS EARTH! · Control the roots to avoid rocks and insects and to draw in more water and nutrients. Select the root to control Controlling direction of roots · Losing your roots means you lose water! · When the evil tree is in full bloom, you will taste the sweetness of victory!
